FuncDef: The reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics command resets packet statistics in an RBS buffer in a BAS dual-device hot backup scenario.
CLIs: reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics slot <slot-id>
reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics user-id <user-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a user.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics slot 1
<HUAWEI> reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics user-id 100
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a BAS dual-device hot backup scenario, if packet statistics in an RBP buffer are not needed or overflow, run the reset multicast remote-backup bas statistics command to reset the packets statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
